sect1.title: git checkout/co
sect1.para: git checkout or svn co. This command is used to make a branch of the local repository visible in the working directory.

note.title: Note to Subversion Users
note.para: git checkout is somehow confusing to subversion users because it is very different from svn checkout. The former is closer to svn switch. When using Git, you'll find yourself creating branches rather often, and using git checkout to switch between them, so it is a rather common command.
